channel.title: Compiler help!
channel.description:
hi this is my frist post but i need help plzzz!ill be soo gratefull if u help me
okay so i am wanting to start a server i know how to do everything just i need a source. i tried many but when i try to compile it to make sure it works it says "u do not have jdk 6.0 or jdk 5.0 plz go to this website"(java) but i do have jdk. i have the latest version jdk 6 u 14 and my setts are all right.
plz help :( :( :( :confused: :confused:

item.title: Compiler help!
item.dc:creator: @mikeyismyname mikeyismyname
item.description:
@mikeyismyname wrote:

Si Force:

Declare your enviromental variables/classpath, also download JDK if you have not.

if u dint read at begining i have jdk 6 updater 14 (newest)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 07, 2009, 01:24:00 pm[/size][hr]any help plz!

Read full topic

item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Edit: This is a good tutorial for you to look at.

item.title: Compiler help!
item.dc:creator: @mikeyismyname mikeyismyname
item.description:
@mikeyismyname wrote:

[quote=“Si Force, post:8, topic:282700”] @echo off javac *.java pause

This is all you need in a compiler.[/quote]
nope it just says javac isnt reconized as an internal command

Read full topic

item.description:
@si_force wrote:

@echo off javac *.java pause

This is all you need in a compiler.

item.title: Compiler help!
item.dc:creator: @mikeyismyname mikeyismyname
item.description:
@mikeyismyname wrote:

[quote=“Owner Nader, post:4, topic:282700”]Right click on compile ad edit to ur current code to this @echo off title Server Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\YOURJAVAVERSION\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause
it should work,[/quote]
it did work now it says cant find the path specdified

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler help!
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Nader Owner Nader
item.description:
@Owner_Nader wrote:

Right click on compile ad edit to ur current code to this @echo off title Server Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\YOURJAVAVERSION\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause
it should work,

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler help!
item.dc:creator: @mikeyismyname mikeyismyname
item.description:
@mikeyismyname wrote:

[quote=“M4jor P4yn3, post:2, topic:282700”]right click on compile and click edit then erase everything in there and put this in it

@echo off
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit[/quote]

i got the same messsage

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler help!
item.dc:creator: @M4jor_P4yn3 M4jor P4yn3
item.description:
@M4jor_P4yn3 wrote:

right click on compile and click edit then erase everything in there and put this in it

@echo off
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

Read full topic
